item.description:
[color=red][b]I am so sorry, I put the wrong date. The show is tonight, Friday, June 4th, not Saturday June 5th. I sincerely apologize for the confusion. Hope you all can still make it.[/b][/color]
The Two Man Gentleman Band is a retro vaudeville group. Alexis says they are an absolute RIOT and are amazing in person. But why not join us and see for yourself? Below are some youtube links of their act. Cover is only $8. Hope to see you there! -Neil 203-645-2008
<xobject><xembed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/fv2GDMohKws" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="344" style="margin : 5px ; max-width : 700px ; max-height : 700px"></xembed></xobject>
<xobject><xembed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/GEn6rVqpt9w" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="344" style="margin : 5px ; max-width : 700px ; max-height : 700px"></xembed></xobject>
<xobject><xembed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/YKOi_Vc6Vlo" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="344" style="margin : 5px ; max-width : 700px ; max-height : 700px"></xembed></xobject>
item.name: Two Man Gentleman Band - TONIGHT, Not Saturday
